ComicInfo.Summary:
The Puppets stand as the only line of defense against Anapa’s forces. With the addition of the Golem to their ranks, can they even the odds or is the battle already lost for Toulon’s stringless Puppets? Don’t miss the conclusion to the Blood Debt story arc!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|--------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Michela Da Sacco (p, i) & Yann Perrelet (c) | 1 | | Var | Sketch Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Michela Da Sacco (p, i) | 2 | | Var | Kill Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Andrew Mangum (p, i) & Gene Jimenez (c) | 3 | | Var | Kill Variant Sketch Cover, Limited to 1500 | Andrew Mangum | 4 |
Note: The digital edition (5/18/2016) for this issue was released before the print edition.
ComicInfo.Title: Blood Debt (4 of 4)
